solution_line_template: Mark is {amy_age} years + {mark_age_difference} years = <<{amy_age}+{mark_age_difference}={mark_current_age}>>{mark_current_age} years old.
In {years_in_future} years, he will be {mark_current_age} years + {years_in_future} years = <<{mark_current_age}+{years_in_future}={mark_future_age}>>{mark_future_age} years old.
